Indian Economy.title: Supriya Sule extends veiled support to quota based on economic status
Indian Economy.summary: When the audience was asked if there should be an economic-background-based reservation or a caste-based reservation, the majority of them voted for the former.

Indian Economy.title: How Bihar is using night-time light to gauge its economic growth
Indian Economy.summary: A study by the Bihar government shows that while Patna, Vaishali, Muzaffarpur, Gaya and Begusarai at top five districts in terms of faster economic growth, Arwal, Jehanabad, Jamui, Banka and Madhubani are top five ‘emerging districts’.

Indian Economy.title: From cement kilns to crop fields: How captured carbon could revolutionise Indian fertiliser production
Indian Economy.summary: Transforming cement plant CO₂ emissions into green urea could revolutionize India's agriculture, economy, and climate goals, offering a sustainable solution.

Indian Economy.title: Stock market danger: The myth of buoyancy has turned it into a hamster wheel
Indian Economy.summary: The Indian stock market’s buoyancy is a myth with multiple holes. Not only could it be masking a deeper crisis in household savings, but the government may also have a pressing reason to keep capital markets in perpetual motion.

Indian Economy.summary: H-1B fee hike is a wake up call

Stock Market.title: Share Market Highlights 22 Sept 2025: Sensex, Nifty slip as IT stocks sink on US H-1B visa fee shock
Stock Market.summary: Sensex, Nifty updates on 22 Sept 2025: Indian equity benchmarks ended lower on Monday, led by a sharp sell-off in information technology stocks after the U.S. announced a steep $100,000 fee on new H-1B visa applications. The Sensex fell 466 points, or 0.56%, …

Stock Market.title: H-1B visa fee hike, trade talks with US, GST cut to drive markets this week: Analysts
Stock Market.summary: Last week, the BSE benchmark jumped 721.53 points or 0.88 per cent, and the Nifty climbed 213.05 points or 0.84 per cent.

Stock Market.summary: Sensex, Nifty, Share Price LIVE: The short-term outlook for Can Fin Homes is bullish. The stock has been inching down over the last few days. However, supports are there at ₹768 and ₹755 which can limit the downside. Resistance is at ₹790. A fresh rise either…

Startups & Funding.title: Investment surge expected in India's AI sector, says WestBridge's Rishit Desai
Startups & Funding.summary: WestBridge Capital believes that due to strong business demand, India’s AI startups could raise $100 million within a year.

Technology Sector.summary: Endurance was always the bedrock of badminton, but plenty of work is going into aerobic power, drilling ability to change sudden direction unlike linear movements, the diagonal and backward acceleration and deceleration skills.
